channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2026 World Baseball Classic Caps Unveiled for All 20 Countries
item.description: The hats for all 20 countries in the 2026 World Baseball Classic were unveiled on Thursday. Take a look!

item.title: No. 1 Arizona Wildcats Dominating with Size and Physicality Under Tommy Lloyd
item.description: Head coach Tommy Lloyd has transformed the Arizona Wildcats into a rebounding powerhouse with a bulked-up roster strategy.

item.title: 2026 UFL Draft: Every Player Selected by Position for All 8 Teams
item.description: The 2026 UFL Draft is taking place at UFL HQ in Arlington, Texas on Jan. 13 and 14. Here are the draft results, by team.

item.title: 2026 MLB Free Agent Signings, Trades: Rockies Sign 2024 All-Star on 2-Year Deal
item.description: Keeping tabs on all of MLB's notable free agency signings, trades, and extensions ahead of the 2026 season.

item.title: 'I'll Be Nervous': Kershaw on Potentially Facing Ohtani at World Baseball Classic
item.description: Clayton Kershaw will pitch for Team USA for at the World Baseball Classic. Just don't ask him to pitch against Shohei Ohtani.

item.title: Sources: Kuminga demands trade from Warriors
item.description: Warriors forward Jonathan Kuminga has demanded a trade away from Golden State, league sources told ESPN.

item.title: Rory: LIV not signing anyone who moves needle
item.description: Even if LIV Golf spends hundreds of millions of dollars to re-sign two-time U.S. Open winner Bryson DeChambeau, PGA Tour star Rory McIlroy said he doe...

item.title: Dozens charged with college hoops point shaving
item.description: A college basketball point-shaving scheme involving more than 39 players on 17 teams resulted in dozens of games in the previous two seasons being fix...

item.title: Source: Commanders to hire son of Doug Williams
item.description: The Commanders are hiring D.J. Williams, the son of franchise great Doug Williams, to be their quarterbacks coach, the latest addition to a new-look s...

item.title: Mavs' Flagg doubtful vs. Jazz with ankle sprain
item.description: Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg is listed as doubtful for Thursday night's home game against the Utah Jazz due to a left ankle sprain.
